name: The Forest Shrine
description:
This is a short game made in 24h with the development tool GBStudio (https://www.gbstudio.dev/). The reasons for developing the game were

1) To see what kind of game I can make in 24h
2) To try out GBStudio

Story:
The light of the nearby shrine has been extinguished. The village is at risk of being overun by monsters. Light the fire to strengthen the protective barrier.
